descriptionHtml:
Description:
This mod allows you to have Christine Demonfox and have her as a follower, She is found in Whiterun on the second level of the Bannered Mare siting on a chair overlooking the Inn. To marry her just simply get a Amulet of Mara from the Priest in Riften (If you have one already and there is no option to marry her go to Riften and talk to the priest because you must talk to the priest to unlock the features of marrying people in Skyrim!) and once you are wearing it talk to her and you should see an option like \"Interested me?\" etc...
To have her follow you just choose the action \"Follow me. I need your help\"

How to install:
Install the file and copy/cut it into the Skyrim Data file
Or use the Nexus Mod Manager that should work

Mod requires Dawnguard due to her armor

Bugs:
She is stuck using a femalecommanders voiceset due to khajit female doesnt have any follower or marriage dialogues
There is currently no other bugs if anyone notices any leave me a message

Future Updates:
May add more Dialogues, possibly Quests or even a story behind her
Working on a non Dawnguard version
author: Christine
